lead_paragraph: ZELMAN--Martin. American Friends of The Hebrew University (AFHU) and The Hebrew University of Jerusalem mourn the passing of our dear friend Martin Zelman. A national Scopus Award laureate who served on AFHU's board of directors, Martin established scholarships and funded pioneering research at Hebrew University, advancing Israel's leading educational and research institution. 1/3
